attributes.action: reduce traffic congestion by allowing vehicles to generally proceed against a red light when turning left and where safe to do so, providing they first give way to pedestrians and other traffic.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have often seen congestion which is partially unnecessary at junctions, because traffic which could proceed by turning left is not allowed to do so.  Where space allows, filter lanes could be built to alleviate congestion, but this provides a solution where space does not allow, and the cost implications are limited.
